bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Unable to add artifacts to interactive session
bug.description: It appears that this is due to the following error: <denchmark-code>Task failed with error: TypeError: fs.createWriteStream is not a function at saveArtifact (/tmp/deepforge-local-exec-f5a05a2fde41813029ef93cbbefa80433a18ea3e/start.js:51:47) at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:97:5) at async InteractiveClient.runTask (/tmp/deepforge-local-exec-f5a05a2fde41813029ef93cbbefa80433a18ea3e/start.js:83:13) </denchmark-code>
